thread.title: Report: HUD Senior Adviser Fired For Anti-Trump Writings During Campaign
thread.title_full: Report: HUD Senior Adviser Fired For Anti-Trump Writings During Campaign

author: Matt Shuham
title: Report: HUD Senior Adviser Fired For Anti-Trump Writings During Campaign
text:
A senior adviser in the Department of Housing and Urban Development was fired after anti-Trump writings penned during the presidential campaign surfaced as he was being vetted for his new job, the New York Times reported Thursday.
Read More â†’
